# The tokenizer extension

Configure the `tokenizer` extension.

This extension provides interface to the PHP tokenizer embedded in the Zend
Engine.

## EXT_TOKENIZER

* Default: `ON`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## EXT_TOKENIZER_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
